version_description: Algunas mejoras de la interfaz de usuario, y ahora en caso de un error, puede enviarme correo electr√≥nico con detalles de error de inmediato.
Mejora de procesamiento de contactos
Optimized blocking list updating - more faster now!

Added:
- displaying information about which extension is being updated in the moment;
- checking that Contacts were modified (added/changed/deleted phone numbers) and suggesting user to update blocking list;
- internal improvements;
Small internal improvements
Improving processing of Contacts

Changes:
- allows adding prefixes without country code now (use Without Country Code row in country list)
- informs about troubles during latest iOS blocklist refreshing and allows to reload extensions manually
- processes Contacts list even fast
Now the app allows to filter SMS and MMS from prefixed numbers, marking them as spam! (supported by iOS 11)
Adapted for iPhone X

Localized to German
Added Ascension Island country code
Add keywords to block SMS/MMS
Small fix
Added several International Services codes
Small fixes

Great news! Now the app supports blocking up to 30 millions numbers! (added 5 extensions to Settings)
But please, use it only if you really need it - blocking more numbers takes more time!

Thank you all for using the app, and if you faced some p
Small fix

Changes:
- Add/Edit Screen - added flag "Update block list immediately" - now you can postpone updating until you have added all prefixes.
- SMS are blocked now if sender name contains a keyword too
- Added Saint Helena country code (+290)

Changes:
- Added Search bar to Country list, now you can find what you need by code/name.
- Fixed a bug with 4-digit Country codes

Changes:
- Now the app can block up to 40 million numbers!
- Added ability to sort prefixes in numerical order
- Other visual improvements

iCloud integration - now you can save and restore prefixes!
UI improvements.
Small UI changes
Added confirmation dialog after prefix deleting

Added 5 new extensions to block additional 10 millions numbers
Optimized block list updating
Fixed issue when you paste some number from Phone app
Some UI changes
Small fix
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Added carrier code +888 : Telecommunications for Disaster Relief by OCHA
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Added autosaving prefix list to iCloud
Added Dark mode support

Added ability to share prefix list via AirDrop
Added separate News screen

Added 10 extra extensions, so now the app can block up to 70 millions numbers! It's available after buying in-app purchase (Help - Purchases).
And, as always, I am asking you to use this only if you really need it - the more phone numbers you block, th
